PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-03712015-03-26,  ,  ,  ,  IC
ActBusiness Development Bank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry of CLAUDE MC MASTER of Longueuil, Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Business Development Bank of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Rick Perkins.
AttachmentsAttachment
